std::wint_t fgetwc( std::FILE* stream );

{{dcl|
std::wint_t getwc( std::FILE* stream );
}}
{{dcl end}}

Reads the next wide character from the given input stream. {{c|getwc()}} may be implemented as a macro and may evaluate {{tt|stream}} more than once.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|stream|to read the wide character from}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
The next wide character from the stream or {{lc|WEOF}} if an error has occurred or the end of file has been reached. If an encoding error occurred, {{lc|errno}} is set to {{lc|EILSEQ}}.
